tweet: Too cool: the Fortnite merch store ( https://t.co/KNL4IFCFHk) lets you pay in Monero, so now you can purchase that sweet Durrr Burger onesie without your friends / family / coworkers judging you.

@matt_odell The store provider is very interested in LN, and we’re pushing hard to get them to add that to the list. Right now they’ve only enabled Monero, even though they have a number of options (including bech32-enabled Bitcoin).
I’m old enough to remember when a single daily candle could melt faces with Monero. Wen. Please.  https://t.co/OKpYscDIjG
